author: Jelisa Castrodale, Hilary Pollack
title: Church Services During Coronavirus Are Just a Modern Form of Snake-Handling
description: Amid the pandemic, churches ignoring stay-at-home orders claim that holy love is enough to protect their members from deadly illness.
content:
This weekend, despite the advice of health experts, federal authorities, and state officials, many churches held Easter services. 
At the Awaken church in Jonesboro, Arkansas, worshipers were still welcome to congregate as long as they "avoid entering the fa… [+8689 chars]
